text: @GavinNewsom Your premise literally defies history.  The infected have always been quarantined, and data long-suggested your per-capita COVID19 mortality rate is 0.03 %.  You are literally virtue-signaling by justifying the crippling of California’s economy for a statistically-invalid reason.
